title: Verify: Selecting HBO NOW successfully opens the HBO NOW app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND has gone to the "App Store"
AND has added the "HBO NOW" app to their library
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the HBO NOW app will open successfully

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND HBO NOW is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN HBO NOW will open successfully

title: Verify: HBO NOW can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND HBO NOW is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects HBO NOW from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the HBO NOW will open successfully

title: Verify: User receives an access gate (walled garden) if they have not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND HBO NOW app is installed
AND the user has not previously accessed the app
custom_steps: WHEN the HBO NOW app is access
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an access gate
AND we will be unable to continue without first logging in

title: Verify: User will NOT receive an access gate if they have previously logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "HBO NOW" app is installed
AND we have already logged into the "HBO NOW" app with an account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the "HBO NOW" app from the main Apple TV screen
custom_expected:
THEN the access gate will not be encountered
AND the user will be brought to the Home screen

title: Welcome Screen: Verify access gate offers the viewer a choice to Subscribe w/ iTunes,  Sign IN or Restore iTunes purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the app
custom_steps: WHEN we access HBO Now And are presented with the access gate (the Welcome screen)
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with three options:

1.  Sign up (to purchase using an iTunes account + free trial (if eligible))

2.  Sign in to existing HBO NOW account (or MVPD)

3.  Sign in (restore an existing iTunes account)

title: Welcome Screen: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
Subscribe (AppleID user Not signed in): Verify selecting the Subscribe button opens the iTunes Sign in Page
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no HBO NOW user is signed in
custom_steps: Select the Subscribe button
custom_expected:
iTunes Store Sign in Screen:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Apple ID entry field & Submit button

title: iTunes Store Sign in: Verify selecting Submit button opens the iTunes PASSWORD submission Page  - (if Apple ID user is not signed in)
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no HBO NOW user is signed in
AND user has Selected Subscribe from Welcome screen
custom_steps:
1. Enter valid AppleID email
2. select "Submit"
custom_expected:
iTunes Store Password Screen displays:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Password entry field & Submit button

title: iTunes Password screen: Verify selecting Submit button opens the HBO Now Registration screen (if AppleID not previously signed in)
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no HBO NOW user is signed in
AND user has Selected Subscribe from Welcome screen
And user has submitted a valid apple ID (email)
custom_steps:
1. Enter valid AppleID password
2. select "Submit"
custom_expected:
HBO Now registration Screen displays:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Apple ID is auto filled in Email field 
(right side) Submit button

title: Scenario: iTunes Login Authentication Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND we no HBO Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the iTunes Sign in screen
A. AND we enter invalid Apple ID credentials (ID or password)


B. AND if we attempt to sign in more than 5x with invalid credentials
custom_expected:
A. THEN a Login Error *Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable
*AND a CANCEL button will be present

*B. THEN we will be locked out of sign in attempts/the app for 30 minutes



*needs confirmation

title: Subscribe (AppleID user Signed in): Verify selecting the Subscribe button opens the HBO Now user registration Email Page*
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no HBO NOW user is signed in
AND Apple ID user is signed in
custom_steps: Select the Subscribe button
custom_expected:
HBO Now user registration Screen:
(Left side screen) Virtual Keyboard
(right side) Email field *(w/ Apple ID autofilled) & Submit button

*TBD?: AppleID must be used, otherwise confirmation email with linking instrutions will not be received and account cannot be recovered.

title: HBO Now user registration: Verify selecting the Submit button opens the HBO Now TOU & PP agreement
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND launched from the ATV menu
AND no HBO NOW user is signed in
AND Apple ID user is signed in
custom_steps:
On The HBO Now User registration page, with Apple Id filled in the email entry field,
Select the Submit button
custom_expected:
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy screen displays with the following elements:
 - TOU & PP Header and Text: Header is centered above text window and text is contained within the scrollable window
 - Agree (button)
 - Disagree (button)

All text is clear and readable

title: Terms & Privacy Screen: Verify selecting the Agree button on the TOU and PP screen opens the Confirm Subscription screen
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the HBO Now user registration
custom_steps: At the Terms of use and Privacy policy screen select "AGREE" button.
custom_expected:
The Subscription Confirmation screen displays:
 - Confirmation message 
 - Subscribe (button)
 - Cancel (button)
 - Help text/url

title: Terms & Privacy Screen: Verify selecting the Disagree button on the TOU and PP screen returns the user to the Welcome Screen (access gate)
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the HBO Now user registration
custom_steps: At the Terms of use and Privacy policy screen select "DISAGREE" button.
custom_expected:
The user is returned back to the Welcome Screen, with the three options:

1.  Sign up (to purchase using an iTunes account + free trial (if eligible))

2.  Sign in to existing HBO NOW account (or MVPD)

3.  Sign in (restore an existing iTunes account)

title: Confirm Subscription: Verify selecting the CANCEL button on Confirm Subscription screen returns the user to the Welcome Screen (access gate)
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the HBO Now user registration
AND TOU & PP have been accepted
custom_steps: At Subscription Confirmation screen select "CANCEL" button.
custom_expected:
The user is returned back to the Welcome Screen, with the three options:

1.  Sign up (to purchase using an iTunes account + free trial (if eligible))

2.  Sign in to existing HBO NOW account (or MVPD)

3.  Sign in (restore an existing iTunes account)

title: Confirm Subscription: Verify selecting the SUBSCRIBE button on Confirm Subscription screen takes user to HBO Now Home screen
custom_preconds:
HBO NOW has been downloaded to ATV 
AND has progressed through the In app purchase flow to the HBO Now user registration
AND TOU & PP have been accepted
custom_steps: At Subscription Confirmation screen select "SUBSCRIBE" button.
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen
AND the Home screen should display featured assets:
+ Series
+ Movies
+ Comedy
+ Sports 
+ Documentaries
+ Collections
AND no Continue Watching asset is listed
AND the assets are able to be scrolled through
AND the assets are selectable/playable

title: Verifying Backend receipt of Registration
custom_preconds:
ATV Legacy device not logged in to any Apple accounts.
If testing in QA environment a QA IAP Enabled bag with QA Endpoints will be needed.
custom_steps:
1) Start with an ATV Legacy device not logged into any apple accounts. 
2) Fresh install of HBO QA AdHoc build also not logged in.
3)Launch app and select "Start Free Trial".
4) Follow IAP flow to completion. Provide a valid e-mail address to link HBO Account to. 
**Do not use the IAP e-mail address, as you will not be able to verify receipt of the registration e-mail.**
5) Verify account reg e-mail is received.
6) Open the registration E-mail and select the "Complete your profile" button.
7) When the registration site opens, the URL will be https://www.hbonow.com/register-profile. **If test is being done in QA environment, Change the "www" to "qa" and refresh the site.**
8) Complete the account registration on the Registration site.
9) Verify video playback on device.
10)Verify with backend developers that the registered e-mail address appears in the appropriate Database.
custom_expected:
*Account registration e-mail will be received.
*User will be able to initiate video playback on device when logged into the new account.
*Backend devs will verify the registration e-mail appears in the appropriate Database

title: Scenario: User restores purchase
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps:
When the user has installed the application
And the user launches the application
And accesses the pay wall
And selects the 'Already Purchased?' Restore button
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted to enter their iTunes credentials
And upon entering the credentials that were previously used for In-App Purchase the user will be granted access
And selects any paid features will give the user access

title: Scenario: User restores purchase on secondary device
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps: When the user attempts to restore their purchase on a secondary device
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted to enter their iTunes credentials
And upon entering the credentials that were previously used for In-App Purchase the user will be granted access
And selecting any paid features will give the user access

title: Scenario: HBO Now Login Authentication Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND we no HBO Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
custom_steps:
WHEN presented with the HBO Now Sign in options screen
AND we select "Sign-in with my HBO NOW user information" button
A. WHEN we enter invalid HBO Now credentials (ID or password)

B. AND if we attempt to sign in more than 5x with invalid credentials
custom_expected:
A. THEN a Login Error *Screen (or message) will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable
*AND a CANCEL button will be present

B. THEN we will be locked out of sign in attempts/the app for 30 minutes
AND a message will display directing the user how to change/update password if they wish to do so before the 30 minutes has passed.

CONTINUE button: selected, will return to the Walled Garden

*needs confirmation

title: Scenario: HBO Now sign in via MVPD purchase 1st time sign in/registration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have not previously registered an HBO Now account
AND no HBO Account is signed in on the ATV
AND at the access gate we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
AND we are presented with the HBO Sign in options screen
custom_steps: WHEN we select "Purchased HBO NOW through a TV/Internet/Mobile Provider? Sign-in here"
custom_expected:
We are presented with message directing us to:
Activate Subscription
Go to HBONOW.com/register to Sign-in with your TV/Internet/Mobile Provider user information and register your HBO NOW account.

title: Scenario: Lapse in Billing Registration Error (Active subscription sign in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND we no HBO Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
AND we select "￼Purchased HBO NOW through a TV/Internet/Mobile Provider" button
custom_steps: WHEN we Sign in with an Active subscription account but there has been a lapse in billing.
custom_expected: Guides user to FAQ with instructions on how to resolve via iTunes.

title: Scenario: Subscription Service Unavailable Registration Error with Active subscription
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND we no HBO Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
AND we select "￼Purchased HBO NOW through a TV/Internet/Mobile Provider" button
custom_steps: WHEN we Sign in with an Active subscription account but iTunes is unreachable
custom_expected:
THEN a Message displays with explanation text...
“Please try again shortly.”

title: Scenario: Subscription Inactive Registration Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO Now app
AND we have previously registered an HBO Now account
AND we no HBO Account is signed in on the ATV
AND we launch HBO Now app and are presented with the access gate
AND we select "Already a subscriber? Sign in."
AND we select "￼Purchased HBO NOW through a TV/Internet/Mobile Provider" button
custom_steps: WHEN we Sign in with an Inactive subscription account
custom_expected: THEN a Message displays and Guides user to pick plan through iTunes or MVPD.

custom_preconds:
Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And the user links it to an HBO NOW web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps: When the user attempts to user their linked account on a second device
custom_expected: Then upon successful login all entitled features should be unlocked

And signed in with valid account

+ Comedy

+ Documentaries

+ (animated Feature carousel - no heading)

+ Comedy
+ Sports

+ Collections

AND in each we activate at least one thumb

title: Verify: Entering an empty Watchlist displays the appropriate message
custom_preconds:
Given the HBO Now channel has been accessed 
And content has not been added to the Watchlist
custom_steps: When the Watchlist menu is accessed
custom_expected:
Then a message is displayed that reads: 

Your Watchlist is empty
Return here to continue in progress titles and watch videos you've saved for later

title: Verify: Content added to Watchlist via Add function populates Watchlist under Watch Later carousel *** (Needs adjustment)
custom_preconds:
Given the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And content has been added to the Watchlist via the Add button from the respective content's launch page
custom_steps: When the Watchlist is accessed
custom_expected: Then a Watch Later carousel is displayed in the Watchlist containing all content that has been added via the Add button

title: Verify: Content can be removed from Watch Later carousel in the Watchlist *** (Needs adjustment)
custom_preconds:
Given the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And content has been added to the Watchlist in the Watch Later carousel
custom_steps:
When content in the Watch Later carousel has been accessed
And the Remove button is activated on that content's launch page
custom_expected:
Then the Remove button changes to an Add button
And going back one screen to the Watchlist menu shows the content has been removed from the Watch Later carousel.

title: Series Home
custom_preconds: GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
custom_steps: WHEN the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_expected:
THEN the Series page is displayed including:

- Featured Series Carousel
- All Series navigable Grid

title: Series Featured Carousel - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Featured Carousel
AND navigates through the Featured Thumbs
custom_expected:
THEN the Carousel displays the Featured Items as expected 
AND each can be selected

title: Series Featured Carousel - Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a thumb from the Featured Carousel
AND activates it
custom_expected:
THEN the app jumps to the expected Series or Asset Page 
AND the Series or Asset page behaves as expected

title: All Series - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any Series Thumb from the All Series Grid
AND navigates through the Series Thumbs
custom_expected:
THEN each thumb can be selected
AND the display of each thumb is as expected

title: All Series - Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a thumb from the All Series Grid
AND activates it
custom_expected:
THEN the app jumps to the expected Series Page 
AND the Series page behaves as expected

title: Series Season: Appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
AND the user has selected and activated any Series Thumb from the All Series Grid
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the Series Season Page
AND selects each Season button
custom_expected:
THEN the page upon landing displays an associated Series Image 
AND a Series Title 
AND an associated set of Season Buttons that when selected display an image associated with that season
AND all appear as expected

title: Series Season: Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
AND the user has selected and activated a Series Thumb from the All Series Grid that has >1 Season available
AND the auto-selected button is Season 1
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates down from the first Season button to the last 
AND from the last available Season button to the first
AND attempts to navigate right and left from each button selected
custom_expected:
THEN all buttons can be selected
AND UP from top button reveals Top Nav Bar, selects and jumps to Series
AND DOWN from last button is disabled
AND LEFT and RIGHT from all buttons are disabled

title: Series Season: Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the HBO NOW Channel has been accessed
AND the Series tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
AND the user has selected and activated any Series Thumb from the All Series Grid
AND the auto-selected button is Season 1
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates the first Season button 
AND returns to Series Season page via MENU
AND activates the second Season button (if available)
AND repeats the 2nd and 3rd steps until all buttons have been activated
custom_expected: THEN each button activated jumps to the associated Series Season Detail page

title: Series Season Detail: Appearance - Not Yet Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page
AND has activated a Season in which the user has not yet viewed any episodes
AND Episode 1 is auto-selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the Season Series Detail Page
AND selects each Episode button 
AND selects the Other Seasons button
custom_expected:
THEN the page upon landing displays a Series Title 
AND the correct Season number beneath the title
AND an associated set of Episode Buttons that when selected display an image associated with that episode
AND at each Episode Button selection associated Title, synopsis and Rating/Release/Runtime information is displayed
AND an Other Seasons button that when selected displays the the image associated with that season
AND all appear as expected

title: Series Season Detail: Appearance - Episodes Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page
AND has has previously viewed <50% of 2 Episodes and noted their titles
AND has noted which Episode was viewed most recently
AND the user is returning to the Season Series Page from the most recently viewed Episode's Asset Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Season Series Detail Page
custom_expected:
THEN the most recently viewed Episode appears in Resume Watching with an associated thumbnail image, Season/Ep numbers and Title 
AND is auto-selected
AND the progress bar for the Resume Watching Episode correctly displays the expected progress
AND the Resume Watching Episode image, Title, Synopsis and Rating/Runtime/Released information is displayed 
AND the additional Episode previously viewed appears in the Episodes list with a progress bar that displays the expected progress
AND all appear as expected

title: Series Season Detail: Appearance - Episodes Viewed - App exit and return
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page
AND has activated a Season in which the user has previously viewed <50% of 2 Episodes and noted their titles
AND has noted which Episode was viewed most recently
AND the user has exited HBO NOW to Apple TV Menu
AND user has relaunched HBO NOW and returned via any path to the same Season Series Page noted in step 1
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Season Series Detail Page
custom_expected:
THEN the most recently viewed Episode appears in Resume Watching with an associated thumbnail image, Season/Ep numbers and Title 
AND is auto-selected
AND the progress bar for the Resume Watching Episode correctly displays the expected progress
AND the Resume Watching Episode image, Title, Synopsis and Rating/Runtime/Released information is displayed 
AND the additional Episode previously viewed appears in the Episodes list with a progress bar that displays the expected progress
AND all appear as expected

title: Series Season Detail: Appearance - Episode Completed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page
AND has activated an Episode button, launched said Episode and watched it to completion 
AND has returned to the Season Series Page via MENU button
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Season Series Detail Page
custom_expected:
THEN the most recently viewed Episode appears in the list queue without a progress bar 
AND is not presented in Resume Watching
AND is auto-selected

title: Series Season Detail: Navigation - Not Yet Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page
AND has activated a Season in which the user has not yet viewed any episodes
AND Episode 1 is auto-selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates up from the first Episode button to the Other Seasons button
AND the user navigates down from the Other Seasons button to the last Episode button
AND attempts to navigate right and left from each button selected
AND navigates from the last Episode button back up to the Other Seasons button
custom_expected:
THEN all buttons can be selected
AND UP from top button reveals Top Nav Bar, selects and jumps to Series
AND DOWN from last button is disabled
AND LEFT and RIGHT from all buttons are disabled

title: Series Season Detail: Navigation - Episodes Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page
AND has activated a Season in which the user has previously viewed <50% of 2 Episodes and noted their titles
AND has noted which Episode was viewed most recently
AND the Resume Watching button is auto selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates up from the Resume Watching button to the Other Seasons button
AND the user navigates down from the Other Seasons button to the last Episode button
AND attempts to navigate right and left from each button selected
AND navigates from the last Episode button back up to the Other Seasons button
custom_expected:
THEN all buttons can be selected
AND UP from top button reveals Top Nav Bar, selects and jumps to Series
AND DOWN from last button is disabled
AND LEFT and RIGHT from all buttons are disabled

title: Series Season Detail: Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Page in which the user has previously viewed <50% of at east 1 Episode
AND the Resume Watching button is auto-selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates the Resume Watching button 
AND returns to Series Season Detail page via MENU
AND activates the second Season button (if available)
AND repeats the 2nd and 3rd steps until all buttons have been activated
custom_expected:
THEN each button activated jumps to the associated Episode Asset page
AND Play is auto-selected at each jump

title: Series Season Detail: Other Seasons
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has accessed a Season 1 Series Detail Page for a Series with >2 Seasons
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates the Other Seasons Button
AND from the Series Season Page activates Season 2
AND from the Season 2 Series Detail Page activates the Other Seasons Button
AND from the Series Season Page again activates Season 2
AND returns to the Season 1 Detail page via four activations of the ATV controller's MENU button
custom_expected:
THEN each Other Seasons button activated jumps to the associated Season Series page
AND each activated Series button jumps to the associated Season Series Detail page
AND the user is able to back out to the Season 1 Detail page without issue

title: Episode Asset Page: Appearance - Not Yet Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Detail Page
AND has activated an Episode which the user has not yet viewed or added to Watchlist
AND PLAY is auto-selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Series Episode Asset Page
custom_expected:
THEN the page upon landing displays an Episode Title  
AND an associated Episode Image
AND the associated synopsis
AND Rating/Runtime/Release information is displayed
AND Play/Add/More buttons
AND all appear as expected

title: Episode Asset Page: Appearance - Previously Viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Detail Page
AND has activated an Episode which the user has viewed >50% and added to Watchlist
AND PLAY is auto-selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Series Episode Asset Page
custom_expected:
THEN the page upon landing displays an Episode Title  
AND an associated Episode Image
AND the associated synopsis
AND Rating/Runtime/Release information is displayed
AND a progress bar 
AND Play/Remove/More buttons
AND all appear as expected

title: Episode Asset Page: Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Detail Page
AND has activated an Episode 
AND PLAY is auto-selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates up from any button
AND down from any button 
AND left from Play
AND right from More
custom_expected:
THEN up from any button selects Series in Top Nav Bar (down returns to button nav'd from)
AND down from any button transitions to More (up returns to button nav'd from)
AND left from Play and Right from More are disabled

title: Episode Asset Page: Video Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has accessed a Season Series Detail Page
AND has activated an Episode 
AND PLAY is auto-selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user activates Play
AND from playback returns to Episode Asset page via MENU button
AND activates Add button
AND activates Remove Button
AND activates More button
custom_expected:
THEN the app launches the expected Episode at Play
AND the Add button text changes to Remove at activation
AND the Remove button text changes to Add at activation
AND the app transitions to More when More is activated

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Auto-play/Play Next Episode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60mins
AND the video is part of a Series
AND we have watched to the Credits
And 5 seconds of Credits have played
custom_expected:
THEN we are presented with the 'Next experience' visual elements:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/952)

A Thumbnail image and metatdata of the next Ep. to the right of the main window
AND Two buttons below the main window
Play Next Episode
More Episodes

• User can to proceed to next episode by selecting Play Next Episode
• Selecting More Episodes returns the user to then series season view

At the end of the episode video stream (00:00), user is automatically advanced to beginning of next episode
• •
• •
Applies to Series/Episodes only
End of season flows into beginning of next (if
available)
Does not include extras content
Language, closed captions and volume settings
carry over

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Auto-play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have accessed a series
AND we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60mins
custom_steps:
WHEN we have watched to the Credits
AND after 5 seconds of Credits we are presented with the "Next Experience"
AND we allow the video to play to the end of the video stream
custom_expected:
At the end of the episode video stream (00:00), user is automatically advanced to beginning of next episode
• •
• •
Applies to Series/Episodes only
End of season flows into beginning of next (if
available)
Does not include extras content
Language, closed captions and volume settings
carry over

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: Play Next Episode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have accessed a series
AND we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60mins
custom_steps:
WHEN we have watched to the Credits
AND after 5 seconds of Credits we are presented with the "Next Experience"
AND we choose PLAY NEXT EPISODE
custom_expected:
THEN we are advanced to beginning of next episode in full screen
AND playback continues without issue.
• •
• •
Applies to Series/Episodes only
End of season flows into beginning of next (if
available)
Does not include extras content
Language, closed captions and volume settings
carry over

title: Series/Episodes Play to credits: More Episodes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have accessed a series
AND we launch a video feed with a TRT > 60mins
custom_steps:
WHEN we have watched to the Credits
AND after 5 seconds of Credits we are presented with the "Next Experience"
AND we choose MORE EPISODES
custom_expected: THEN we are returned to the series season view.

title: Verify: Kids Asset Details Appearance at Activation - Not viewed
custom_preconds:

AND the Kids tab on the menu bar has been selected
custom_steps: WHEN a thumb for a program that has not yet been launched has been activated

THEN the Asset Details page is displayed including:

 - Rating

title: More: Verify Selecting More opens More page
custom_preconds: Given the HBO Now Channel has been accessed
custom_steps: When the More tab in the top Nav bar has been selected.
custom_expected:
The MORE list opens to display: 

 - Right side of screen: MORE appears centered over the list of categories
(in the following order top to bottom)
  + Sports
  + Comedy
  + Documentaries
  + Collections
  + Late Night

 - The "Series" option is highlighted

title: Search: Verify Selecting Search opens the Search Page
custom_preconds: Given the HBO Now Channel has been accessed
custom_steps: When the Search tab in the top Nav bar has been selected.
custom_expected:
The Search Menu opens up containing: 
- the word SEARCH appears in the top center of the screen.
- the keyboard on the left side of the screen appears.  
- A cursor appears in the Search For box
- The "a" character is highlighted on the keyboard

title: Search: Verify that as letters are typed search results are auto suggested
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
custom_steps: When characters are inputted in the Search For field
custom_expected:
Then suggested results will appear in the right hand window
And these results will be grouped via category including (but not limited to):
-Movies
-Series
-Sports
-Documentaries 
etc.

title: Search: Verify that when CLEAR is selected search terms disappear from the screen
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a search query has returned valid results
custom_steps: When the CLEAR button has been activated
custom_expected:
All of the search results have been removed from the screen. 
And the SEARCH FOR is empty save for a blinking cursor.

title: Results: Verify that selecting a result grouped in the Movies category opens the appropriate page
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a query has been inputted that returns results grouped in the Movie category
custom_steps: When the Movie search result has been activated
custom_expected: The Movie launch page opens up.

title: Results: Verify that backing out of the Movie Launch page via the Menu button returns the app to the Search results screen
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a valid search query has returned results grouped in the Movie category
And a Movie search result has been activated taking the app to the Movie Launch page
custom_steps: When the MENU button is pressed while on the Movie results page
custom_expected:
The app goes back to the previous Search Results page
And the search query results remain present onscreen
And the a movie result is highlighted.

title: Results: Verify that selecting a result grouped in the Series category opens the appropriate page
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a query has been inputted that returns results grouped in the Series category
custom_steps: When a Series Search result is activated
custom_expected: The Series Launch page opens up with all applicable seasons for the series displayed and selectable.

title: Results: Verify that backing out of the Series page via the Menu button returns the app to the Search results screen
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a valid search query has returned results grouped in the Series category
And a Series search result has been activated taking the app to the Series page
custom_steps: When the MENU button is pressed while on the Series page
custom_expected:
The app goes back to the previous Search Results page
And the search query results remain present onscreen.
And a Series result is highlighted.

title: Results: Verify that selecting a result grouped in the Collections category opens the appropriate page
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a query has been inputted that returns results grouped in the Collections category
custom_steps: When a Collections Search result is activated
custom_expected: A collection of VOD content opens up which can all be activated and direct to their respective launch pages.

title: Results: Verify that backing out of the Collections page via the Menu button returns the app to the Search results screen
custom_preconds:
Given that the HBO Now channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a valid search query has returned results grouped in the Collections category
And a Collections search result has been activated taking the app to the appropriate Collections page
custom_steps: When the MENU button is pressed while on the Collections page
custom_expected:
The app goes back to the previous Search Results page
And the search query results remain present onscreen.
And a Collections result is highlighted.

- Your subscription will auto-renew on <DATE> and your <Subscription email> account will be charged $14.99.

title: Video Player UI - Appearance and Timeout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap any button
custom_expected:
THEN the Play Controls overlay the video playback at launch
AND after 15 seconds they disappear
AND tapping any button again will repeat the appearing function
AND after 15 seconds they disappear

This will fail due to this closed bug: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/HBOCD-541

title: Video Player UI - Functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed HBO NOW
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap Up
AND the Player Controls overlay appears
AND the we attempt these displayed controls
custom_expected:
THEN the controls will function as displayed (Apple TV standard player):

- Up opens Episode Pop Up with Episode Image, Title, Synopsis and "more options" hint
- Down closes UI and an additional DOWN switches timeline to "chapter mode"
- In standard UI the Right and Left activation ramp SEEK FWD/BACK up to 3 speeds
- In "chapter mode" the Right and Left activation Skip through set chapter markers
- Holding down the ATV Remote's SELECT button pauses playback jumps to More Options Menu

custom_preconds:

AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:

AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to launch (asset) page

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality degrades with restrictive network connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Apple TV device is connected to a Network Proxy Tool
AND the user has set up a fluctuating bandwidth rule
custom_steps:
WHEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Apple TV Apps menu
AND a valid HBO Now account is linked to the app
IF playback of an asset has been initiated
custom_expected: THEN playback bitrate fluctuates until "settling" on the minimum supported stream

title: Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Apple TV device is connected to a Network Proxy Tool
AND the user has set up and enabled a restrictive bandwidth rule
custom_steps:
WHEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Apple TV Apps menu
AND a valid HBO Now account is linked to the app
AND playback of an asset has been initiated
IF the restrictive bandwidth rule is disabled
custom_expected: THEN playback returns to the highest supported bitrate allowed by the user's internet connection

title: Network: Verify the following bandwidth connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the Apple TV device is connected to a Network Proxy Tool
AND the user has set up and enabled a restrictive bandwidth rule
custom_steps:
WHEN the HBO Now channel has been accessed from the Apple TV Apps menu
AND a valid HBO Now account is linked to the app
AND playback of an asset has been initiated
custom_expected:
Verify playback and bitrate switching on the following connection speeds:

- 10 MBPS
- 5 MBPS
- 3 MBPS (minimum supported connection)
- 1.5 MBPS
- >1MBPS

title: Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the Apple TV device is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected:
THEN the expected fail message appears
AND (BL to add additional expectations)

AND (BL to add additional expectations)
